title: Interior Wall Decorations
author: Atlas Lumi
detailed: Let's you decorate your base with pictures, and upload your own.

title: ModData
author: STBlade
detailed: A utility mod for TLD that lets other mods save data independently of the save file.

title: Item Piles
author: Atlas Lumi
detailed: Adds blueprints for stacked items.

title: SurvivorKnowledge
author: Fuar
detailed: Simulates survivor knowledge by locking crafting recipes and harvesting actions behind skill levels.

title: Noodles
author: Thekillergreece
detailed: Introduces noodles food items.

title: DisableBreathEffect
author: Thekillergreece
detailed: Disables Breath Effects.

title: MotionTracker
author: Digitalzombie
detailed: Adds a minimap that can show animals and spraypaint markings

title: ItemPicker
author: Digitalzombie
detailed:
Skip item inspection on picking up stick/stones or other items.

Mass pickup of all sticks/stones or other items in a radius around you. With or without calorie cost.

Full customizable.

title: DIY by Santana
author: Atlas Lumi
detailed: Adds craftable furniture.

title: MoreLockedDoors
author: Fuar
detailed: Adds more locks to doors and buildings around the game world.

title: Limitless Container Space
author: Atlas Lumi
detailed: Increases the capacity of all containers to 10000KG

title: Clothing Pack by 'TKG' v4.4.1
author: Thekillergreece
detailed: Introduces 9 clothing items, including two prison clothes.

title: CanneryManufactoringDLC
author: Digitalzombie
detailed: Designed to improve the usability of the Last Resort Cannery Workshop in Bleak Inlet, especially on Interloper difficulty.

title: Wooden Statues
author: Thekillergreece
detailed: Introduces 4 wooden animal statues, small and large.

title: Archery Target Practice
author: Thekillergreece
detailed: A target for you to level up your archery skills a bit.

title: InfiniteFires
author: Digitalzombie
detailed: Set fires to infinite duration with middle mousebutton

title: ImprovedSignalVoid
author: Fuar
detailed: Improves the Signal Void Tale with QOL customization options.

title: AudioCore
author: Digitalzombie
detailed:
A plugin that enables the standard Unity audio engine. Does nothing on it's own.
Timecaspule version available on Github.

title: FoodPackByTKG
author: Thekillergreece
detailed:
Introduces 33 new food items to the game.

This mod was expanded with Waltz's mod in mind so be sure to download that one too!

title: AudioManager
author: Digitalzombie
detailed:
Helper mod for using custom audioclips and controlling vanilla audio. 

Disable flare audio, disable waterfall audio adjust wind effect volume (eg. like clattering) when indoors, adjust aurora music volume

title: LonelyOrca
author: Digitalzombie
detailed: A classic mod ported over to post-DLC TLD. A lonely orca is living in Desolation Point.

title: ImprovedLoadingScreens
author: Fuar
detailed: A mod that improves the loading screens of the game with custom tips, background images and the ability to enable or disable various aspects of the loading screens.

title: Better-Water-Management
author: STBlade
detailed:
Mod improving the way water is managed for The Long Dark.

Installation Instructions

title: TimberwolvesAnywhere
author: STBlade
detailed: Allows the user to decide what type of wolves will spawn in a region.

title: FullSwing
author: Digitalzombie
detailed: Adds options to modify swing speed and radius of fridge doors

title: GearSpawner
author: STBlade
detailed: Utility mod for spawning modded items.

title: Candlelight
author: Digitalzombie
detailed: Adds candles and new materials to craft candles

title: AlternativeActionUtilities
author: Digitalzombie
detailed: A utility mod for custom actions when clicking on things.

title: Relentless Night
author: ShieldHeart
detailed:
For TLD 2.10+ use RN 4.6.3, TLD 2.06&2.08 use RN 4.6.1
The spin of the earth is slowing. Days and nights are getting longer. Every long night gets colder and harsher than the last. Nowhere is safe from the cold. How long will you survive in this eerie new world?

You can keep up with mod discussion, updates, and report any issues at our Relentless Mods discord channel with this - INVITE.

title: Story Mode Collectibles
author: Atlas Lumi
detailed: Adds collectible items from Wintermute into survival mode.

title: TLD-WolfskinScarf
author: Atlas Lumi
detailed: Adds a new craftable scarf made of wolf fur.

title: CraftingRevisions
author: STBlade
detailed: Improves the Crafting UI and enables custom blueprint creation.

title: FasterSearching
author: zeobviouslyfakeacc
detailed: Speeds up the search action on containers and makes searching instant for empty containers.

title: FoodsByCalorieWaltz
author: Waltz
detailed:
Adds 20+ unique, delicious food and beverage items. Insludes cute collectibles and handy settings!

Installed by unpacking it into .../Mods/

title: NorthfolkClothingPack
author: Waltz
detailed:
Adds 2 previously seen + 3 brand new, inspired by northern folk, craftable clothes.

It's a standard ModComponent pack, installed by dropping it into .../Mods/

title: ModComponent
author: STBlade
detailed: Utility Mod; lets you load external item packs.

title: DeveloperConsole
author: zeobviouslyfakeacc
detailed: A mod that makes Hinterland's developer console accessible in-game. F1 to open / close the console, type 'help' to get a list of commands.

title: Better-Stacking
author: STBlade
detailed:
Makes more items stackable in the inventory.

Patreon

title: CustomSettingsTweaker
author: Cass
detailed: Allows you to change and fine-tune several settings in a CUSTOM mode game (new or existing), such as Hunger, Thirst, Fatigue, Condition Recovery etc. This is a PRE-RELEASE VERSION for testing and feedback. Full instructions in the README.

title: TinyTweaks-BuryHumanCorpses
author: Waltz
detailed: Get rid of those nasty corpses by right-clicking on them

title: Coordinates-Grabber
author: STBlade
detailed:
Utility mod. Allows you to see/copy the name, position, rotation, and scene of interactive items.

Patreon

title: TinyTweaks-RespawnablePlants
author: Waltz
detailed: Plants will now regrow after 45 days (can be changed)

title: TinyTweaks-ExtendedFOVSlider
author: Waltz
detailed: Extend FOV slider to 150

title: TinyTweaks-MapTextOuline
author: Waltz
detailed: Outline text on the map, so you can actually see what it says. Has a few variants

title: TinyTweaks-FixDroppedOrientation
author: Waltz
detailed: Fix dropped wooden matches and rifle to be in correct orientation. Because yes, they were incorrect

title: SillyMod
author: Waltz
detailed:
Enables fun: gear items physics, collisions and more

Don't use it on your normal save, you'll regret it

title: LocalizationUtilities
author: STBlade
detailed: Utility mod for localized text.

title: PastimeReading
author: Waltz
detailed:
Adds a readable, customizable book with animations and stuff.

Showcasing video. Detailed review(has subtitles).

Mod is installed by extracting .zip into .../Mods/

title: KeyboardUtilities
author: STBlade
detailed:
A utility mod that enables other mods to more easily use keyboard and mouse input.

Patreon

title: TimeAccelerator
author: STBlade
detailed:
Allows the player to speed up time without changing the game difficulty.

Patreon

title: SonicMode
author: STBlade
detailed:
Lets you sprint up to 30 times faster and control other movement characteristics.

Patreon

title: ArrowMod
author: ttr
detailed:
Allows to change duration of crafting arrow and arrowhead. Adds additionall crafting options for arrows.

Warning: game needs to be restarted after settings change.

title: MapTweaks
author: ttr
detailed: Change time and range of map survey. Allows get vista bonus w/o polaroids

title: StruggleTweaks
author: ttr
detailed: Set chance to instantly kill wolf after struggle or change bleedout time for wolf. Also you can change tap power to save your mouse buttons

title: ToolsQuality
author: ttr
detailed: Keep Your tools sharp. Low condition of tool increase time to perform actions.

title: UnityExplorer
author: STBlade
detailed:
An in-game UI for exploring, debugging, and modifying Unity games.

Install Instructions

title: AmbientLights
author: Xpazeman
detailed: This mod aims to modify the default lightning for interiors with windows, making them brighter so you don't need a light source during midday to move around, and also more reflective of what's happening outside (time of day, weather, and sun position).

title: WeightTweaks
author: Xpazeman
detailed: Mod for The Long Dark to modify item weights and carry capacity.

title: ExportJournal
author: STBlade
detailed: A mod for The Long Dark (2.06+) which allows the player to export the journal data of the active save game.

title: HouseLights
author: Xpazeman
detailed: Mod for The Long Dark that magically brings electricity back. You can turn lights on and off by using the light switches.

title: KeroseneLampTweaks
author: Xpazeman
detailed: Mod for The Long Dark to modify the rates of fuel consumption for kerosene lamps and the color they emit.

title: DarkerNights
author: Xpazeman
detailed: Mod for The Long Dark to make nights darker, giving a new challenge.

title: GearDecayModifier
author: Xpazeman
detailed: Mod for The Long Dark to modify decay rates of gear. Settings go from completely stopping decay to making it much faster. Various categories to change.

title: RandomMainMenu
author: Xpazeman
detailed: This mod randomizes the time and weather in the main menu screen so it changes everytime you enter it.

title: IndoorCampfires
author: Xpazeman
detailed: This mod allows you to create campfires indoors.

title: WorkingClocks
author: Xpazeman
detailed: Mod for The Long Dark that makes some of the clocks in the game work.

title: Sky Co-op
author: Filigrani
detailed: Multiplayer mod for the game

title: CraftingAnywhere
author: Cass
detailed: Allows you to remove the location requirements from craftable items (workbench, forge etc). Full instructions in the README.

title: SunOrientationFixes
author: Cass
detailed: Fixes the sun orientation in several regions. Now all regions should be consistent with each other and the world map.

title: Jump
author: Waltz
detailed: Allows you to jump. Also has some settings. Installed by dropping it into .../Mods/

title: Personality
author: Waltz
detailed:
Lets you customize your character: replace textures and change outfit

Installed by unpacking it into .../Mods/

title: PlacingAnywhere
author: Xpazeman
detailed: Mod for The Long Dark that removes restrictions when placing items, and adds controls to rotate and position the object.

title: ModSettings
author: zeobviouslyfakeacc
detailed: Lets other mods display their settings in-game. This mod doesn't do anything on its own and should only be used as a dependency for other mods.

title: SkipIntroRedux
author: STBlade
detailed:
Allows the player to skip to the main menu when starting the game.

Patreon

title: Afraid of the Dark
author: Atlas Lumi
detailed: Makes the player anxious at night.

title: SeasonedInterloping
author: STBlade
detailed:
Adds Forsaken Airfield and Bleak Inlet to the list of Interloper start regions.

Patreon

title: UnlimitedRockCaches
author: STBlade
detailed:
A simple TLD (The Long Dark) mod to remove the limitation on how many Rock Caches you can place in a region.

Allow up to 999 rock caches per region (uncertain on performance hit)
Rock caches can now be built right next to each other.

title: ImprovedSoundtrack
author: Fuar
detailed: Improves the in game soundtrack by adding new conditions to play rare or removed music tracks from the OST. Including new location discovered stingers.

title: Opguns
author: DeletedAccount
detailed: Makes gun op with infinite ammo and machine gun fire rates

title: ChooseStartingGear
author: Cass
detailed: Allows you to choose your starting gear when starting a new game. Full instructions in the README.

title: SilentProtagonist
author: Cass
detailed: Silences player character voice. Full instructions in the README.

title: AutoSave
author: Primadonna
detailed: Adds Quicksaves, exit saves, animal trigger saves, lots of saves.

title: QuickPick
author: Primadonna
detailed: Improves UI for picking up objects. Includes Stickpick by Digitalzombie.

title: SnowShelterDecay
author: Primadonna
detailed: Lets you adjust Snow Shelter Decay rate.

title: RevealMap
author: Primadonna
detailed: No more need for charcoal, everything is revealed automatically.

title: ChooseStartingConditions
author: Cass
detailed: Allows you to choose your starting condition, fatigue, hunger, thirst, warmth, injuries and illnesses when starting a new game. Full instructions in the README.

title: ChooseStartingLocation
author: Cass
detailed: Allows you to choose your starting location when starting a new Sandbox game. 300+ locations, all regions, all difficulty modes. Full instructions in the README.

title: WolvesComeOutAtNight
author: Cass
detailed: Prevents wolves spawning during the day. Can set by region or to apply everywhere. Full instructions in the README.

title: BedrollTweaker
author: Cass
detailed: Allows you to change the warmth, weight and decay of bedrolls. Allows bedroll warmth to 'stack' so extra bedrolls in your inventory can add additional warmth. Fully configurable. Full instructions in the README.

title: ClothingTweaker
author: Cass
detailed: Allows you to adjust the warmth, warmth when wet, waterproof, windproof, protection, mobility, weight and decay values of clothing items. Full instructions in the README.

title: Always Rest Maximum
author: Primadonna
detailed: Better sleep menu options.

title: FoodTweaker
author: Cass
detailed: Adjust: calories of food items; cooking time for meat and fish; how much meat shrinks when cooked (raw weight vs cooked weight); difference between weight of whole, raw fish vs cleaned, cooked fish; meat and fish will become 'Hot' after cooking; enable MRE self-heating; option to fix vanilla game error where tea & coffee provide incorrect hydration. Full instructions in the README.

title: HouseBasements
author: STBlade
detailed:
Adds some more basements to the game.

Patreon

title: Astrid_Makeover
author: Primadonna
detailed: Astrid's face in the paperdoll ui in the clothing menu is improved.

title: Read When Hungry
author: bushtail
detailed: New maintainer

title: SmallFixToScenes
author: stmSantana
detailed: This mod allows modifying some items in the mountaineer's hut (Timberwolf mountain).

title: ShelterTemperatureTweaks
author: Cass
detailed: Allows you to tweak the temperature of shelters that have NO LOADING SCREEN, such as the Mountaineer's Hut. Full instructions in the README.

title: ContainerTweaks
author: Cass
detailed: Allows you to change the capacity of containers. Separate settings for each type of container for granular control. Full instructions in the README.

title: RerollBurntBuildings
author: Cass
detailed: Adds console commands that allow you to reroll the random burnt building spawns. Now also includes the random fishing hut doors. Full instructions in the README.

title: DiyBySantana
author: stmSantana
detailed:
(ITEM MOD) Mod to add some craftable furniture.
Move files in the downloaded ZIP to the Mods folder.
Note: Zip files should not be moved to the Mods folder!

title: Vehicle Mod
author: NopirateOnlySteam
detailed: Vehicle Mod is about creating fun and useful vehicles. Every vehicle can be customised with different engines and wheels to change the speed and effective surfaces the vehicles can drive on.(IN FILE INFO.INI INSIDE ADDON FOLDER)

title: Wall_Interior
author: stmSantana
detailed:
(ITEM MOD) Mod to decoration such as posters.
Recommended mod: Placing Anywhere

title: FireAddons
author: ttr
detailed: Allows to use Lantern as fire starter, tinder can be used as fuel and tinder contribiute to firestarting buffs. Reworked embers and allows crafting flint. Details in readme on github.

title: ItemPiles
author: stmSantana
detailed: (ITEM MOD) Mod to add some item piles.

title: TLD-Cigarettes
author: Atlas Lumi
detailed: Adds usable Cigarettes

title: WarmFood
author: ttr
detailed: Adds warming Buff to cooked food and allows calories adjustment for each meat/fish type. Future sucessor: Food Tweaker

title: BringBackComponets
author: NopirateOnlySteam
detailed: Bring Back Component WheelCollider and HinjeJoint API FOR DEVELOPPERS !!!Only patching the components!!!

title: TLD-Morphine
author: Atlas Lumi
detailed: Adds Morphine as a usable item

title: ArrowColorChanger
author: stmSantana
detailed:
You can change the color of the arrow.
Note: Zip files should not be moved to the Mods folder!

title: HowToSurviveBook
author: stmSantana
detailed: Collectable books that increase all skill points are added to the game.

title: FireImprovements
author: Remodor
detailed: Configurable QoL mod all around fire. Including, remember last used fire item, better item sorting for fire starting, better torch/ flare support for fire starting, better torch usability outside of fire starting, configurable no-tinder penalty and no magic fire duration boost.

title: FoodsBySantana
author: stmSantana
detailed:
(ITEM MOD) Mod to add food such as ramen.
Move the two files in the downloaded ZIP to the Mods folder.
Note: Zip files should not be moved to the Mods folder!

title: Show-Map-Location
author: stmSantana
detailed: Displays the player icon on the map like in story mode.

title: AncientGatekeepersCraftingChanges
author: Ancient Gatekeeper
detailed:
Allows the player to craft the Distress Pistol, Homemade Soup, & Renewable Herbal Tea.

Installation Instructions

title: BandageOverhaul
author: Kardyne
detailed: Makes bandages increase infection risk on open wounds unless sterilized beforehand.

title: ToiletPaper
author: stmSantana
detailed: (ITEM MOD) Mod to add toilet paper.

title: WeaponImprovements
author: Remodor
detailed: Small configurable QoL mod which improves the weapon handling and adds the ability to interrupt the reloading process or disable the ammo hud.

title: RelativeConsumptionTime
author: Remodor
detailed: Small QoL mod which changes the absolute time for eating and drinking to a configurable relative time in proportion to the consumed amount. Now also includes relative durations for actions like waiting, harvesting, breaking down, etc.

title: MovableContainers
author: zorgesho
detailed: This mod allows to move some types of containers (inside one location and between locations)

title: AnimalBehavior
author: Remodor
detailed: Let's you customize many animal behavior like fleeing duration, bleed out modifier, wolf behavior on aiming and many more, in addition to the included and enhanced TweakRabbits and DetectionRange. These mods are obsolete and have to be removed in order to use this mod!

title: Fireworks
author: Digitalzombie
detailed: Adds fireworks to the flaregun

title: Quicker Harvesting
author: JoshuaAC
detailed: Changes how long harvestables take to harvest in The Long Dark.

title: Worst Gear First
author: deerie
detailed: With this mod Quick Access shortcuts and Pie Menu will choose worst condition items.

title: StickPick [Legacy]
author: Digitalzombie
detailed: Mod frozen for the time being. Still works on Timecapsule.

title: Solitaire
author: Digitalzombie
detailed: Waste your time in style - play Solitaire

title: Refilling Containers
author: deerie
detailed: After a given number of days refills containers with random items, allowing you to hoard forever.

title: CacheControl
author: zeobviouslyfakeacc
detailed: Lets you decide how many Prepper Caches should spawn in custom mode games.

title: InterloperRegionSelection
author: zeobviouslyfakeacc
detailed: This mod lets you select the spawn region in Interloper mode.

title: NoisemakerBlueprint
author: gamerFinn
detailed: A blueprint for the Noisemaker from Episode 4.

title: AlternateBlueprints
author: gamerFinn
detailed: Alternate Blueprints for the snare and arrowhead.

title: WorkshopBulletCrafting
author: gamerFinn
detailed: A mod for crafting bullets at workbenches.

title: RenewableCoffee
author: gamerFinn
detailed: A mod that lets you craft a tin of coffee with a recycled can, prepared rosehips, and prepared reshi mushrooms

title: Binoculars
author: STBlade
detailed:
Lets you see farther.

Installation Instructions

Patreon

title: BlanketMod
author: STBlade
detailed:
Add a warm blanket to the game. Also adds bedroll crafting.

Patreon

title: Fire-Pack
author: STBlade
detailed:
Introduces a bowdrill and an ember box for carrying hot embers.

Installation Instructions

Patreon

title: ExtraHotkeys
author: zorgesho
detailed: This mod adds additional hotkeys for equipping gear items

title: PlaceFromInventory
author: zorgesho
detailed: This mod allows to place items right from the inventory screen with a right mouse click. Also, it places any stackable items as one item (as stack).

title: SaveAnywhere
author: zorgesho
detailed: This mod allows to save and load anywhere in the survival mode like in the story mode. Also, it can disable permadeath.

title: EnableStatusBarPercentages
author: zeobviouslyfakeacc
detailed: This mod re-enables some labels in the status / first aid screen that show a percentage value of how full the warmth, fatigue, thirst, hunger, and health status bars are.

title: HungerRevamped
author: zeobviouslyfakeacc
detailed: Improves the hunger system by separating hunger and stored calories.

title: Better-Fuel-Management
author: STBlade
detailed:
Makes kerosene management more realistic.

Installation Instructions

Patreon

title: CanneryManufacturing
author: STBlade
detailed:
Makes Bleak Inlet more useful, especially on Interloper.

Installation Instructions

Patreon

title: CraftingHotkey
author: STBlade
detailed:
Add a hotkey for the crafting menu.

Patreon

title: RandomizeInterloperRareSpawns
author: STBlade
detailed:
Disables the Interloper loot tables and replaces them with new random spawns. Do not use on existing saves.

Installation Instructions

Patreon

title: AutoUpdatingPlugin
author: STBlade
detailed:
Plugin. Updates most mods automatically.

Patreon

title: AlcoholMod
author: STBlade
detailed:
An optional addon for ModComponent enabling the alcohol mechanics. Without this, all alcoholic food functions as if it were non-alcoholic.

Patreon

title: ForgeBlueprintsMod
author: STBlade
detailed:
Adds some blueprints for the forge.

Installation Instructions

Patreon

title: UseableMeatMod
author: JoshuaAC
detailed: Changes The Amount of Useable Meat Upon Killing an Animal in The Long Dark.

title: CustomSaveDataUtilities
author: STBlade
detailed:
Utility mod for custom save data on gear items.

Patreon

title: Remove Clutter
author: Xpazeman
detailed: This mods allows you to remove most of the clutter in TLD.

title: Better-Night-Sky
author: STBlade
detailed:
Makes the night sky more realistic.

Patreon

title: FoxCompanion
author: Digitalzombie
detailed: A little fox companion for the lonely TLD player.

title: Festive-Pack
author: TheDevv
detailed: Adds items to make the game look festive.

title: ClothingBlueprints
author: TheDevv
detailed: Adds the ability to craft any clothing item.

title: Prison-Pack
author: TheDevv
detailed: Adds prison clothing to the game.

title: CookWhileFishing
author: zorgesho
detailed: This mod allows to cook the catched fish automatically without interruption of the fishing

title: Bleeding_RV
author: STBlade
detailed: Reworkes the bleeding mechanics of wildlife.

title: MaintainYourself
author: STBlade
detailed: This adds options to customize condition gain. This can make condition recovery much harder or easier, by making recovery proportional to your needs.

title: Non-OP-Torches
author: STBlade
detailed: This mod makes torches less overpowered.

title: Disable-Cabin-Fever
author: STBlade
detailed:
Disables Cabin Fever in all game modes.

Patreon

title: ExtremeTempDrop
author: STBlade
detailed:
Alters temperature degradation.

Patreon

title: ShorterReadingIntervals
author: zeobviouslyfakeacc
detailed: A mod that lets you research for shorter amounts of time and lets you interrupt research at any time without losing progress.

title: MooseSatchelMod
author: ttr
detailed: Reduce scent and decay for meat, fish and guts, if using Moose Bag

title: InfinityFires
author: STBlade
detailed:
Right click on a fire to make it last forever.

Patreon

title: ReadWhenHungry
author: STBlade
detailed:
Allows you to read when you might not be able to otherwise.

Patreon

title: MoreWorkbenches
author: STBlade
detailed:
Adds a few more workbenches to the game.

Patreon

title: BleakBridge
author: STBlade
detailed:
Add a bridge to the Cannery Workshop.

Patreon

title: RadialMenuUtilities
author: STBlade
detailed:
A utility mod that adds the ability for other mods to create custom radial menus.

Patreon

title: BetterMendingXP
author: STBlade
detailed:
Modifies the Mending System to give skill points for crafting.

Patreon

title: Agriculture
author: TheDevv
detailed: Adds the ability to farm in The Long Dark

title: Bedtime-Stories
author: TheDevv
detailed: Adds a mini story in mystery lake.

title: NewWorldFoods
author: TheDevv
detailed: Adds new food items to the game world.

title: StoneTools
author: TheDevv
detailed: Adds the ability to create stone tools in tld.

title: Toggle-HUD
author: STBlade
detailed:
Allows the player to toggle the scent and time-of-day indicators instead of them disappearing after some time.

Patreon

title: Ankle-Support
author: Remodor
detailed: Mod which fixes sprain bugs in TLD and adds configurable sprain support for wrists and ankles.

title: WeaponCrosshair
author: STBlade
detailed:
Allows the player to reenable the crosshair while aiming.

Patreon

title: CustomWhiteout
author: STBlade
detailed:
Custom Whiteout Challenge. Allows the player to set the items to be gathered and the place to gather items to.

Patreon

title: MapMakerTools
author: STBlade
detailed: Mod aiding in mapping the terrain for The Long Dark

title: QuickWitted
author: STBlade
detailed:
Lets you level up individual skills faster

Patreon

title: Disable-Camera-Sway
author: zeobviouslyfakeacc
detailed: Prevents the automatic camera rotation that happens when the player does not move their mouse for some time.

title: BeachcombingAdjustments
author: STBlade
detailed:
Lets you change the loot table for beachcombing.

Patreon

title: Silent-Aurora
author: STBlade
detailed:
Removes the aurora music, including the radio. Does not affect the humming/crackling of electronics.

Patreon

title: IncreaseSaveSlotLimit
author: STBlade
detailed:
Increases the save slot limit to 999 instead of the default 25.

Patreon

title: SaveImageFilter
author: zeobviouslyfakeacc
detailed: Saves and reloads your chosen image filter (Options > Display > Image Filter) instead of reverting to 'no filter' every time the game is restarted.

title: TinCanImprovements
author: zeobviouslyfakeacc
detailed: Allows you to craft 4 tin cans into 1 scrap metal, reduces the weight of tin cans to 0.05 kg, fixes a canned food item weight bug.

title: DurableMaintainance
author: OceanMan
detailed: Mod for The Long Dark to provide settings to allow you to modify decay rates of maintainance tools, like the whetstone.

title: RememberBreakDownItem
author: zeobviouslyfakeacc
detailed: This mod remembers the tool you last used to break down objects such as branches or curtains to make the UI less annoying.

title: EnableFeatProgressInCustomMode
author: zeobviouslyfakeacc
detailed: The v1.29 update turned off feat progress in custom mode games - this mod turns it back on.

title: Disable-Chromatic-Aberration
author: zeobviouslyfakeacc
detailed: Completely disables chromatic aberration for all quality modes. Works with existing games.

title: FreeLookInCars
author: zeobviouslyfakeacc
detailed: Allows looking out of the back window in cars.
